title: Bernard Arnault Becomes First European Worth $300 Billion
shortdescription: LVMH shares surge 40% on China luxury rebound and Dior x Nike collaboration.
description: French luxury titan overtakes Zuckerberg and Larry Ellison as Louis Vuitton, Dior and Sephora report record sales in Asia.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Singapore Slaps 60% Property Tax on Foreign Buyers – Prices Still Rising
shortdescription: World’s toughest cooling measures fail to stop luxury condo prices hitting $3,800/sqft.
description: Despite highest foreign buyer tax on earth, prime district condos up 25% in 2025 — ultra-rich still parking money in Singapore real estate.
author: jonathan Gill

title: Data Centers Are 2025’s Hottest Real Estate – $1M Per Acre in Virginia
shortdescription: Amazon, Microsoft, Google pay record prices for land near power stations.
description: Northern Virginia now most expensive land in America — data center REITs (Digital Realty, Equinix) up 80% YTD on AI demand.
author: jonathan Gill

title: Elon Musk Becomes First Person Worth $500 Billion in 2025
shortdescription: Tesla + SpaceX + xAI valuation surge pushes Musk past half-trillion milestone.
description: Tesla hits $1.8T market cap, SpaceX valued at $350B after Starship success, and xAI raises at $120B — combined wealth now exceeds GDP of most countries.
author: Wade Jenner

title: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang Joins $200 Billion Club After AI Chip Boom
shortdescription: Huang now richer than Google founders combined as NVDA market cap crosses $4 trillion.
description: Blackwell chip delays resolved, data center revenue up 400% — Jensen's wealth grows $2B per week.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Co-Living Explodes in 2025: $500K/Unit Profits for Developers in Major Cities
shortdescription: Gen Z pays $2,500/month for 120 sqft micro-studios with rooftop pools.
description: Companies like Common and Ollie report 95% occupancy — new developments pre-leased before construction finishes.
author: jonathan Gill
